articles.title: Getting started with Mintora Lab
articles.excerpt: Create an account, choose a plan, and start generating images and videos in minutes.
articles.body_html: Create an account, verify your email, and pick a plan or buy credits. Open the Image or Video tab to begin. Use short, clear prompts. You can upscale or re‑render at any time.

articles.title: How billing & credits work
articles.excerpt: Subscriptions include monthly credits. You can buy extra credit packs anytime.
articles.body_html: Plans include a monthly credit allowance. Larger jobs (4K, long video, avatars) use more credits. Credit packs are one‑time purchases and never expire.

articles.title: Do I own the generated content?
articles.excerpt: You own your outputs unless a model provider restricts commercial use.
articles.body_html: You own the outputs you create for lawful purposes, subject to model provider licenses (e.g. OpenAI, Replicate). Avoid using trademarked or copyrighted inputs you do not own.

articles.title: Troubleshooting slow or failed renders
articles.excerpt: Tips for faster generations and how to retry failed jobs.
articles.body_html: Heavy demand can slow providers. Try smaller resolutions first, or re‑queue during off‑peak hours. If a job fails, you’ll be auto‑credited back or you can click Retry.

articles.title: Policies: Terms, Privacy, Refunds & Cookies
articles.excerpt: Links to our policies in one place.
articles.body_html:
• Terms of Service
  • Privacy Policy
  • Refund Policy
  • Cookie Policy

articles.title: Top questions (FAQ)
articles.excerpt: Commercial use, formats, speeds, cancellations, and more.
articles.body_html: See our FAQ for the most common questions about Mintora Lab.
